reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Narda Clone, Single coil  26g Kanthal @.7 ohms.  25W Power, Half wicked with Tencel

**Testing:** OOO Powdered Sugar @ 4%. 70/30 VG/PG, steeped 16 days.

**Flavor Description:**  This is dry, almost gritty like and very sweet. This is a lot like meringue without the eggy and cream notes, exactly what I was expecting from this flavor. The sweetness really lingers and stays with you in the back of your throat.

**Off-flavors:**  Perhaps I used this too high but the sweetness is slightly chemical tasting, nothing too off putting though and I have a feeling it will be covered up fairly easily.

**Throat Hit:**  This is very smooth albeit a little dry but no stingy sensation or tightness.

**Uses & Pairings:**  This is going to be a very versatile part of my collection. I can see using this anywhere I want to sweeten up a mix that isn't very creamy without adding any off flavors. Will be great in bakeries and even as a light dusting of sugar in fruit mixes. 


**Notes:**
I really like this flavor it is very sweet but doesn't seem to gunk up my coils too bad. I think I need to play with this in mixes and using it way lower than I did. But even testing it so high I didn't get too bad of off flavors with it.

If you have different opinions on the flavor or any ideas on how to use it please post them in the comments. Lets start a discussion!
